Preserve Access to Affordable Generics & Biosimilars Act limits anti-competitive pay for delay deals entered into by brand& generic drug companies 2prevent affordable generic drugs or biosimilars from entering the market. Sen Klobuchar & I led bill / voted out of cmte unanimously

Stop STALLING Act helps combat abuse of FDA’s citizen petition process where drug companies file sham petitions to delay approval of low cost generics. Senator Klobuchar & I are the lead sponsors of this bill. It passed the Judiciary Committee by a unanimous voice vote

Prescription Pricing for the People Act requires FTC to study PBM industry & give recommendations to address their anticompetitive business practices I sponsored this bill w Senator Cantwell + others It passed the Judiciary Committee by unanimous voice vote
